Html:
Hi All,

Has there been any discussion of developing a multi-column ComboBox or ListBox for windows forms 2.0? What are the plans, if any?

-Andy

There has been some internal discussion about a gradient highlight list and combo box. They would be multi column. They are not on the list yet but I think they will be for version 2 or 2.5. Version 2 should probably start around February. A little ways out yet but not that long.
